entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 02 May 2016
